Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: When I walked in I was greeted by a warm smile from the person serving me, who later told me their name was Leia. The service was fast and very friendly and the oat milk cappuccino was perfect!

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: We stopped by here to have a breakfast. We ordered French menu and some croissants. Coffee was ok. Boiled egg menu was ok. Nothing special but compare to other breakfast places like staring at Jacob this place is very compact and so pricey! Would not recommend for a breakfast but ok to stop by for a coffee.

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text:
Food was ok but mostly due to waiting so long when already hungry.
We ordered coke and got some herbal rubbish which wasn't what we wanted.
A Dutch lady changed a note for smaller coins while we were here and the staff ‚Ä¶

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: The best coffee in the city. Very popular snack corner. Two extremely inspiring Dutch ladies are taking care of the place on top level. Thanks so much

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text:
Organic but with a plastic straw LOL
as already mentioned here multiple time service is slow and not trained to cook or serve food. Random students making your burgers xD I won't be coming here again.

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text:
Nice little cozy cafe on the way to the Rijksmuseum.  Inside was clean, and the staff were very friendly.
We ordered 2 coffees, and the brew was tasteful. ‚Ä¶

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: I recommend this place! Good breakfast and the chai latte was amazingü§§

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text:
It's a small coffee with amazing food and the loveliest girl serving.
She was working alone and it was crazy busy, but she made fantastic food, running and with a smile on her face! I would give 6 stars if it was possible

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: Cheeseburgers here are excellent. Staff was very friendly and helpful, nice people. No beer or wine but interesting alternatives to the usual soft drinks. We'll definitely come back when we come here again.

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: The Vegan Poke Bowl is so good I had it for lunch 2 days in a row. Lovely small cafe great staff wonderful food. Well worth a visit.

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: When we arrived, we were seated and were asked for our orders. We were waiting for the food when a plate was broken in the kitchen area. As well as this, the food was not served at the same time. However, the food was nice. I like the ‚Ä¶

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text:
Definitely the best place to buy fresh bread in Amsterdam!

I also like their sandwiches and snacks! Plus, they offer samples of their cookies and pastries which is super cool! Staff is amazing!

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: I had a very bad experience. We didn't even get our food. We sat down with menus to order and were over looked for locals. I feel like tourists were not made to feel welcome here. When we finally ordered we sat for 30 minutes and no food ‚Ä¶

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: Breakfast was excellent and offered egg and bacon aswell as pancakes and waffles. You will get your food quickly as well as good looking. They offer some drinks that i have atleast never seen an example would be curiousity cola. Not suited ‚Ä¶

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: My favourite grilled sandwich, with chicken and avocado, place!!! üòçThe place is really nice and welcoming! The staff is very friendly and professional! The food is absolutely delicious! ü§ó You must pay them a visit!

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: Quite possibly the best burger in my life, ever!

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: The perfect place to take a breather and have lunch. Good location in city center, cozy atmosphere and tasty dishes. My bagel and pancakes were delicious.

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: Nice place to have a coffee in the morning. Delicious pancakes. It's a shame they didn't have croissants and fresh bread delivered when we went there.

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: Woman who works there is very moody and unfriendly. Food was also different from expectations based on menu description. Fortunate, as I do love the Stach shops a lot!!

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: Great coffee. Ordered pancakes - got 4 pancakes! Most places you only get three! Try the peanut butter cups!

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: Capuchino was without foam totally.

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: Very nice and cozy place. The chicken sandwich we ordered was very tasty, both the bread and the presentation was good.

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: 8:30 in the morning and I just wanted a coffee. Their coffee machine was having maintenance. Not the best timing.

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: We popped in on a quiet Sunday morning and had coffees and crossoints. The service was friendly and the atmosphere was nice. This is a gentle little place.

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: Beautiful, cosy caf√© close to Rijksmuseum in Amsterdam, at the street which is full of galleries and art shops. Nice, warm atmosphere and very friendly service!

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: Slow service (even by Dutch standards), mediocre food, and expensive. Probably the worst coffee I have had in AMS... Go elsewhere there are better options.

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: For lunch they have very nice sandwiches but the "french breakfast" was quite poor with one croissant with butter and jam and a hard boiled egg

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: The pancakes and any variety of the eggs are amazing, certainly a must try. Friendly staff and typically friendly customers too.

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: Had breakfast here and it was perfect. Cosy place and friendly staff. Highly recommend

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: A big plates, tasty, amazing staff

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: Sat there for 30 mins along with other tourists and then asked to change orders because they don't have the ingredients. What a waste of time. If you're a tourist don't waste your time here.

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: Feel free to ask the staff anything about their coffee and tea. They have a lot of knowledge. Pretty awesome laid back spot to hang out with your +1 or more.

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: We only had a coffee there, but it was a good coffee. The burgers smelled really good though.

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: Vegan friendly and allergy friendly! We had the vegan chicken poke bowl!

Name: Stach cafe
Review Text: Really nice place for breakfast or brunch. Good coffee, friendly personel üôÇ I'll be back

Name: Stach cafe
